body:
The documentation of `depends_on` currently reads:

```
spack.depends_on(*args, **kwargs)
Creates a dict of deps with specs defining when they apply.
```

We now have multiple dependency types, and package reviewers insist that they be used properly. Consequently I need these to be documented so that I can do that, instead of using `grep` to look for examples.
title: Document `depends_on`
